&lt;li&gt;Create comprehensive talent maps to share insights on the talent market&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Represent Brex to candidates, helping to find and attract exceptional talent&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Interview candidates combining various methods (e.g. structured interviews, technical assessments, and behavioral questions)&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong organizational skills to coordinate recruiting efforts across multiple stakeholders&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Knowledge of HR practices and employment practices&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;BS in Human Resources or a relevant degree&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Must be willing to work in office 2 days per week on Wednesday and Thursday&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience with Greenhouse ATS and Gem&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Experience working in a high-growth startup&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Compensation&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;The expected salary range for this role is $85,600 - $107,000.&amp;nbsp; Depending on the position offered, equity and other forms of compensation may be provided as part of a total compensation package.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;content-conclusion&quot;&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Please be aware, job-seekers may be at risk of targeting by malicious actors looking for personal data. As the Senior Accountant on the Accounts Payable team, you will be exposed to a variety of areas, including but not limited to, our credit card and treasury products, intercompany transactions, expense accruals, legal entity reporting, account reconciliations, fluctuation analysis, and more. You will work cross-functionally with a detail-oriented mindset, where creative problem-solving is highly valued. The Senior Accountant is expected to manage multiple priorities concurrently without compromising quality.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Where you&#39;ll work&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;This role will be based in our New York office. &lt;li&gt;Support month-end and year-end activities including the preparation of journal entries, accruals, reconciliations, 1099 reporting, and variance analytics&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; research and analyze accounting transactions; verify the accuracy of data; and reconcile financial data and accounts&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Proficient in Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and address difficult situations in a professional manner&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Innovative and able to provide “outside the box” solutions&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Passion for having an owner’s mentality towards responsibilities and for career growth&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Ability to work independently and manage deadlines effectively&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Strong interpersonal and written communication skills&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus Points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Licensed CPA&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;A combination of public accounting and private industry experience&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Knowledge and experience using NetSuite, Coupa, Brex, Auditoria, or Pigment&lt;/li&gt; Application Security is part of our wider Financial Scale organization, which means you will work closely with Security Operations, GRC, Product Security, Front End Platform,&amp;nbsp; IT Infrastructure teams.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;We’re looking for individuals with a strong background and interest in penetration testing. You should have a demonstrated ability to find vulnerabilities in complex systems and craft exploits to demonstrate business impact. You should be enthusiastic about working with a variety of backgrounds, roles, and needs. &lt;li&gt;Collaborative mindset paired with strong written and verbal communication skills&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Bonus points&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Proficiency with Kotlin, gRPC, GraphQL, Kubernetes&lt;/li&gt;
